医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
虚拟瑜伽项目有望缓解慢性腰痛克利夫兰诊所的研究人员发现，为期 12 周的虚拟瑜伽治疗慢性腰痛项目可能是一种可行、安全且有效的治疗选择。研究结果发表在《JAMA Network Open》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Virtual-yoga-program-shows-promise-for-chronic-low-back-pain-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Virtual-yoga-program-shows-promise-for-chronic-low-back-pain-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23232a91-1fa3-4b08-b039-66097f3cb475 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:34:00 -0400 Virtual yoga program shows promise for chronic low back pain relief
研究强调房屋隔热以抵御冬季寒冷对健康的好处冬季，寒冷的室内温度会导致血压升高，导致高血压和心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-highlights-health-benefits-of-insulated-homes-against-winter-cold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-highlights-health-benefits-of-insulated-homes-against-winter-cold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fff9ea35-efab-4116-86c3-a59965a0a803 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:25:00 -0400 Study highlights health benefits of insulating homes against winter cold
AI 提供 ICU 抗菌药物耐药性的当天评估人工智能 (AI) 可以为重症监护患者提供当天的抗菌药物耐药性评估，这对于预防危及生命的败血症至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/AI-provides-same-day-assessments-of-antimicrobial-resistance-in-ICUs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/AI-provides-same-day-assessments-of-antimicrobial-resistance-in-ICUs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2071905a-0630-4e26-8c81-ca2127665ec6 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:18:00 -0400 AI provides same-day assessments of antimicrobial resistance in ICUs
研究揭示了与帕金森病相关的蛋白质聚集的新机制熊本大学的一组研究人员发现了有害蛋白质聚集体形成的突破性机制，这种聚集体会导致帕金森病等神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Research-uncovers-new-mechanism-in- Protein-aggregation-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Research-uncovers-new-mechanism-in- Protein-aggregation-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07216033-73be-41b2-aa96-b11461c43b33 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 14:10:00 -0400 Research uncovers new mechanism in protein aggregation linked to Parkinson's disease
研究将大脑蛋白质与功能连接的个体差异联系起来神经科学的一个长期目标是了解微观尺度上的分子和细胞结构如何在宏观尺度上引起大脑区域之间的通信。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-links-brain- Proteins-to-individual-differences-in-function-connectivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-links-brain- Proteins-to-individual-differences-in-function-connectivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d4c39af-bb4f-4357-a54f-de5d9f21fb83 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 13:06:00 -0400 Study links brain proteins to individual differences in functional connectivity
新的成像方法可以改变基因表达研究他们说一张图片胜过一千个文字。密歇根大学研究人员开发的一种新方法可以创建价值数千兆字节数据的图像，这可能会彻底改变生物学家研究基因表达的方式。 Seq-Scope 由 Jun Hee Lee 博士、Hyun Min Kang 博士及其同事开发，于 2021 年在《Cell》中首次描述，是第一种以亚微米级空间分辨率分析基因表达的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/New-imaging-method-could-transform-gene-express-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/New-imaging-method-could-transform-gene-express-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddbbf5cb-9256-418c-bc2d-0f5171679f87 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 12:55:00 -0400 New imaging method could transform gene expression research
青光眼药物可能有助于预防阿尔茨海默病相关的 tau 蛋白积聚一种常用于治疗青光眼的药物已在斑马鱼和小鼠体内被证明可以防止 tau 蛋白在大脑中积聚，这种蛋白会导致各种形式的痴呆症，并与阿尔茨海默病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Glaucoma-medication-may-help-prevent-Alzheimers-lated-tau-build-up.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Glaucoma-medication-may-help-prevent-Alzheimers-lated-tau-build-up.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff7cdeff-3f9f-4298-a86d-242a26c67a44 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 12:47:00 -0400 Glaucoma medication may help prevent Alzheimer's-related tau build-up
童年时期的忽视与成年后的身心健康问题有关多伦多大学的新研究发现，即使儿童时期没有遭受性虐待和身体虐待，儿童时期的忽视也与成年后的一系列心理和身体健康问题有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Childhood-neglect-linked-with-mental-and-physical-health-problems-in-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Childhood-neglect-linked-with-mental-and-physical-health-problems-in-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b380d69f-b685-4b39-ba3c-eeeed929fe05 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 12:39:00 -0400 Childhood neglect linked with mental and physical health problems in adulthood
突破性研究揭示移植后干细胞动力学科学家们首次追踪了移植后数十年干细胞的变化，揭开了移植手术 50 多年来的谜团。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Groundwriting-study-sheds-light-on-stem-cell-dynamics-post-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Groundwriting-study-sheds-light-on-stem-cell-dynamics-post-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fe17eab-c86a-40c3-b2f8-ca839ec35a91 Fri, 01 Nov 2024 12:30:00 -0400 Groundbreaking study sheds light on stem cell dynamics post-transplant
研究表明阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停与女性痴呆症风险增加有关一种常见但未被充分诊断的睡眠障碍会导致成年人患上痴呆症；密歇根医学的一项研究表明，尤其是女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-links-obstructive-sleep-apnea-to-increased-dementia-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241101/Study-links-obstructive-sleep-apnea-to-increased-dementia-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7693a42-91cb-41ba-89bb-b9670a1e859f Fri, 01 Nov 2024 12:24:13 -0400 Study links obstructive sleep apnea to increased dementia risk in women
